= Ontology module =

Get the number of Ontologies available:

<a href="http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/ontology/count" target="_blank">
    http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/ontology/count
</a>

Get one Ontology by Id (this Id is the internal JBioWH WID that change in all DB):

<a href="http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/ontology/2069819" target="_blank">
    http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/ontology/2069819
</a>

Get from/to Ontologies by range:

<a href="http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/ontology/1/3">
    http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/ontology/1/3
</a>

</a>
